Trips.description: A trip to Bali, Indonesia. We visited the beaches, the temples, and the rice fields. We also went to the monkey forest and the waterfalls.

extraStuff.name: Beaches
extraStuff.description: We visited the beaches in Bali. They were beautiful and the water was warm.

extraStuff.name: Temples
extraStuff.description: We visited the temples in Bali. They were beautiful and the architecture was amazing.

extraStuff.name: Rice Fields
extraStuff.description: We visited the rice fields in Bali. They were beautiful and the rice was delicious.

extraStuff.name: Monkey Forest
extraStuff.description: We visited the monkey forest in Bali. The monkeys were cute and friendly.

extraStuff.name: Waterfalls
extraStuff.description: We visited the waterfalls in Bali. They were beautiful and the water was refreshing.
